name: Super Tumble Bear
description:
The Game

Control a hungry bear who's too lazy to run or even walk in this challenging arcade platformer.  Roll through five varied worlds, looking for berries and pineapples to satisfy your appetite! Maybe if you're lucky, you'll find a delicious blueberry.

Controls

Move - Arrow Keys/WASD

Pause - Escape

Select - Enter

Content

20 CHALLENGING Levels

5 Unique Worlds

Relaxing Music
